usage.h1: font-serif text-5xl md:text-7xl tracking-tight leading-tight text-gold-100
usage.caption: font-sans text-xs uppercase tracking-[0.2em] text-gold-400

textures.gold_dust: Custom canvas particle effect in hero

effects.tracing_beam: Animated gradient border for service cards

Button.variant_primary: bg-gold-400 text-obsidian font-bold uppercase tracking-wider px-8 py-4 hover:bg-gold-300 transition-colors duration-300 rounded-none
Button.variant_outline: bg-transparent border border-gold-400 text-gold-400 hover:bg-gold-400 hover:text-obsidian uppercase tracking-wider px-8 py-4 transition-all duration-300 rounded-none

Card.style: bg-charcoal border border-white/5 hover:border-gold-400/50 transition-colors duration-500 group relative overflow-hidden

Input.style: bg-transparent border-b border-white/20 focus:border-gold-400 outline-none text-white placeholder-white/30 rounded-none px-0 py-4 transition-all

motion.scroll: Use 'framer-motion' useScroll for parallax effects on background images

sections: Hero (Full screen, gold glitter texture, editorial typography)
Services (Asymmetrical grid, hover reveals abstract gold textures)
Gallery (Bento grid, mix of close-ups and atmosphere)
Price List (Elegant minimal table with gold dividers)
Testimonials (Slow scroll marquee or fade carousel)
Promotions (High contrast banner with gold border)
Footer (Large typography, social links, location map)

universal_guidelines: Do not use gradients for dark backgrounds, use solid Obsidian #050505 with subtle noise.
Text MUST be readable. Use Gold #D4AF37 for accents only, not for long body text.
Buttons should have sharp edges (rounded-none) for a high-fashion look.
Images must be treated with a subtle dark overlay (bg-black/20) to ensure text contrast if text is over them.
Avoid standard 'card' layouts. Use lines and whitespace to separate content.
Use 'Playfair Display' for all Headings (h1-h3) and 'Manrope' for body text.
Implement a smooth scroll effect if possible.
instructions_to_main_agent: Update tailwind.config.js with the custom gold colors and font families immediately.
Create a reusable 'Section' component that handles the standard padding (py-24 px-6).
Use the provided Unsplash URLs. Do not use placeholders.
For the 'Social Media Feed', create a static grid of images (from the gallery assets) that links to the Instagram profile.
Ensure the 'Contact' section includes the specific phone numbers and address provided in the prompt.
